price: Aba Adi bahinyuye (Intumwa yabo Hudu); mbega uko ibihano byanjye no kuburira kwanjye byari bimeze!
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat ʿādun fakayfa kāna ʿadhābī wanudhuri
